name: The Sims 2: Teen Style Stuff
storyline:
The Socialite: Design a bedroom with a luxurious bed complete with drapery crown and vanity table. A carved wardrobe is perfect for your Socialite teen to keep her designer jeans and other stylish accessories. Young girl Sims can lounge around in pajamas that include a cami, pants and matching fuzzy slippers.

The Sport Lifestyle: Deck out your Sim’s room with a skateboard and surfboard wall sculpture to reflect their edgy yet laidback lifestyle. Give them khaki cargo shorts and other clothes that are perfect for lounging.

The Goth: Transform your Goth Sim’s room into a reflection of their lifestyle with furnishings that fit like a black and red armoire and velvet chairs. Fill their wardrobe with dark attire including buckles, belts, and heavy boots for him and leather, tattoos, and fishnets for her.
summary: Give your teen Sims everything they need to express their unique style with The Sims 2: Teen Style Stuff, a stuff pack for The Sims 2! Now your teen Sims can show some attitude with all-new, unique furniture, decor items, fashions and more with three distinct themes - Goth, Thrasher, and Socialite. Give your Sims a new stereo, TV, and other gadgets to keep them up to date and in touch with their friends. Make sure your Sims are always sporting the latest teen fashions including track suits, designer jeans, and yoga outfits. Let your young Sims express themselves in ways only teenagers can!
